name: dir-snapshot-tool
description: Creates a snapshot of a directory and its contents

scripts.build: npm run remove_type_files && npm run remove_js_files && npm run build_esm
scripts.build_all: npm run remove_type_files && npm run remove_js_files && npm run build_esm && npm run create_types
scripts.remove_type_files: del /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd dist && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ../src && del /s /q *.d.ts *.d.ts.map && cd ..
